main_MSG_mayorQueCero: Must be a number greater than zero
contacto_LBL_descripcion: Send us your comments. We will try to attend you as soon as possible
contacto_LBL_respuesta: Check here if you want an answer
consumo_MSG_resumen: {{registros}} Consumption records uploaded from {{desde}} up to {{hasta}}
precios_LBL_ahorroAnualPorciento: Annual savings related to the original expense
precios_msg_limiteAutoconsumo:
There is no EU subvention with consumption of less than 80% of production.
Current value: {{autoconsumo}}%
proyecto_LBL_accion_mapa1: Double click on the map indicates the position of the facility (You can use <Locate> field for a search by address)
proyecto_LBL_accion_mapa2: Second double click to indicate the geographical orientation of the panels
mapa_MSG_territorio: The application is only valid for Spain
mapa_MSG_insular: Be careful, you are in non-peninsular territory. The 3.0TD fees are not correct.
ayuda_TIT_localizacion: Geographical location data are identified in this tab
ayuda_TIT_consumo: This tab identifies fees and consumption data before installation
ayuda_TIT_resultados: This tab shows the energy balance resulting from the installation of the panels
ayuda_TIT_precios: This tab shows the economic-financial balance
ayuda_TIT_graficos: This tab shows some reference graphs
consumo_MSG_numeroLimitadoRegistros: Warning: there are only {{registros}} records that do not complete a year of statistics
consumo_MSG_definirFicheroConsumo: You must define the consumption file before continuing
consumo_MSG_definirPotenciaBaseREE: You must define a base annual power greater than 0 for the REE profile
app_descripcion: Here we will have fields to identify the project, including LAT-LONG location that will allow us to search for the correct data in PVGIS
resultados_TT_energiaFaltante: Energy demanded from the grid when consumption is higher than production
resultados_TT_energiaSobrante: Energy poured into the grid when production is higher than consumption
resultados_TT_energiaFaltante%Consumo: Annual demanded consumption / Annual total consumption
resultados_TT_energiaSobrante%Produccion: Annual total Surplus / Annual total Production
resultados_LBL_kgCO2AnualAhorrado: kg of CO2 saved per year
resultados_TT_energíaDemandadaVersusGene: Annual energy consumed / Annual energy produced (must be greater than 80% to qualify for subsidy)
resultados_TT_energiaAhorrada: Annual energy produced / Annual energy consumed
resultados_TT_autoconsumoMedioAnual: Energy consumed directly from the panels in a year and percentage of total production
resultados_TT_autosuficienciaMediaAnual: Percentage of self-consumption over total consumption
resultados_LBL_graficoResumen: Summary graph of consumption versus production
graficos_LBL_balanceConsumo: Monthly balance of consumption with {{potencia}} kWp installed
graficos_LBL_balanceProduccion: Monthly production balance with {{potencia}} installed kWp
graficos_LBL_tituloBalanceEconomico: Monthly economic balance with {{potencia}} kWp installed
graficos_LBL_produccionMediaMensual: Average monthly production with {{potencia}} kWp installed / average monthly consumption
parametros_LBL_kgCO2AnualPorkWh: Annual kg of CO2 per kWh
parametros_LBL_descripcion: Configuration of application parameters. Changes in these values do not imply a recalculation of the whole set, it is necessary to return to the Project tab and calculate.
parametros_LBL_perdidasSistema: Estimated losses of the installation in %
parametros_LBL_interesVAN: Base interest (%) for calculation of VAN
mapa_MSG_definePosicionMapa: You must define at least one base on the map
rendimiento_MSG_errorFetch: Error executing fetch in PVGIS. Reply:
